briefTitle: Nutritional Status and Pharmacological Treatment: Impact on the Toxicity and Quality of Life of Patients With Colorectal and Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Nutritional Status and Pharmacological Treatment: Impact on the Toxicity and Quality of Life of Patients With Colorectal and Breast Cancer
conditions: Nutritional Status, Colorectal Cancer, Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Impact in Quality of Life during pharmacological treatments
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Pathological diagnosis of Colorectal Cancer or Breast Cancer
* Must have Performance Status to undergo surgery and pharmacological treatment (Adjuvant or Neoadjuvant treatment)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Non-operable patients
* Pacientes with poor Performance Status Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (PS ECOG) \>2
